case.title: Looking To Date An Awesome, Nice Chinese Woman Living In London (South East London)
case.text:
Hi
I am black guy in my 20s and I like to be creative and I enjoy activities like creative writing, go-karts, quad bikes and water sports. I also like to discover and learn new things.
I'm looking for a chinese woman who is creative, polite, friendly down to earth and has an awesome sense of humour. Someone who is looking for a serious relationship.
If you interested in meeting for coffee then get in touch thank you.
